text: Pordenone (; Venetian and ) is the main comune of Pordenone province of northeast Italy in the Friuli-Venezia Giulia region. ==Notes== ==Other websites== * Official website * Town Art Museum * Western Friuli Archaeological Museum * Town Science Museum * Castello di Torre Category:Cities in Friuli-Venezia Giulia Category:Capital cities in Italy Category:Settlements in Pordenone
title: Pordenone
